source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
The translation is: "Around 1,400 deployed officers have accordingly arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now investigating further cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact numbers on the crime at the opening session will be available in the next week.".

German = "Stadtverwaltung" -> English = "city administration", German = "Sparmaßnahmen" -> English = "cost-cutting measures", German = "Bürgermeister" -> English = "mayor", German = "Bürgerinitiativen" -> English = "citizen initiatives", German = "Kritik" -> English = "criticism", German = "Beschluss" -> English = "decision", German = "Schlüsselprojekt" -> English = "key project", German = "Einwohner" -> English = "residents", German = "Bevölkerung" -> English = "population", German = "Verwaltung" -> English = "administration". 
The text is: "Die Stadtverwaltung will mit Sparmaßnahmen den Haushalt ausgleichen. Der Bürgermeister reagiert auf Bürgerinitiativen, die sich gegen die geplanten Kosteneinsparungen aus dem Schlüsselprojekt richten. Die Kritik der Einwohner an dem geplanten Beschluss zur Ausgliederung der Verwaltung von der Stadtverwaltung ist laut Bürgermeister sehr groß. Er hofft jedoch, dass die Bevölkerung diese Verwaltungsumorganisation auch für eine bessere Lösung hält."
 
The translation is: "The city administration wants to balance the budget with cost-cutting measures. The mayor is reacting to citizen initiatives that are directed against the planned cost savings from the key project. The criticism of the residents about the planned decision to outsource the administration from the city administration is very big according to the mayor. However,

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
